settings.custom_liquid:
<video class="desktop-video-banner-bobatribe" width="100%" playsinline loop controls muted autoplay data-desktop-vid="https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/1dacbf86e03241dfbc86b9d472237b17.mp4" data-mobile-vid="https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/3bba527f9fe842afa8dd261d0e686772.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>
<script>

//get all vids
var video =  document.querySelectorAll('video')

//add source to video tag
function addSourceToVideo(element, src) {
    var source = document.createElement('source');
    source.src = src;
    source.type = 'video/mp4';
	console.log(src);
    element.appendChild(source);
	
}

//determine screen size and select mobile or desktop vid
function whichSizeVideo(element, src) {
	var windowWidth = window.innerWidth ? window.innerWidth : $(window).width();
	if (windowWidth > 750 ) {
		addSourceToVideo( element, src.dataset.desktopVid);
	} else {
		addSourceToVideo(element, src.dataset.mobileVid);
	}
}

//init only if page has videos
function videoSize() {
	if (video !== undefined) {
	video.forEach(function(element, index) {
			whichSizeVideo(  
				element, //element
				element  //src locations
			);	
		});
	}
}
videoSize();
</script>

settings.text:
Upgrade your bubble tea experience with everything you need to be a fully kitted out bubble tea connoisseur

This limited edition collection contains:

  • The ALL-NEW Silicone Bubble Tea Straw Keyring set
  • Coloured Silicone Bubble Tea Straws
  • Boba Keyring Case
  • Airpods & Airpods Pro BBT cases
  • The CUTEST Mini Backpack
  • A reusable grocery bag

Attention all bubble tea lovers!

Introducing the cutest and most adorable mini boba backpack that will steal your heart and become your new favorite accessory!

This backpack is designed for all boba lovers out there who want to show off their passion for bubble tea.

Trust me, you won't be able to stop smiling every time you wear it.

Let's start with our AirPods cases.

They are made of high-quality silicone material that will protect your precious AirPods from scratches, bumps, and dirt. Not only that, but they also come in the most kawaii designs ever!

And for those who want to take their boba obsession to the next level, we have the cutest bubble tea themed keyring ever! This little accessory is perfect for attaching to your keys or bag.

<style>
.content-for-layout{

}
.section-template--15155624935485__e8c08799-6207-4468-ae01-6ed3864068a3-padding{

}
@media screen and (max-width:740px){

border-radius:10px 10px 0 0 !important;
}
#shopify-section-template--15155624935485__251c9d4c-7586-4adf-acd3-99d237176fe6 .image-with-text .image-with-text__grid--reverse .image-with-text__media-item--top  .image-with-text__media{
border-radius:10px 10px 0 0 !important;
}
#ImageWithText--template--15155624935485__251c9d4c-7586-4adf-acd3-99d237176fe6{
border-radius:0 0 10px 10px !important;
}
#shopify-section-template--15155624935485__6375f045-07ce-4ce8-a63e-7f143c93c376 .image-with-text .image-with-text__grid--reverse .image-with-text__media-item--top  .image-with-text__media{
border-radius:10px 10px 0 0 !important;
}
#ImageWithText--template--15155624935485__6375f045-07ce-4ce8-a63e-7f143c93c376{
border-radius:0 0 10px 10px !important;
}
.image-with-text__content{
border-radius:0 0 10px 10px !important;
}
}

.image-with-text .image-with-text__grid--reverse .image-with-text__media-item--top  .image-with-text__media{
border-radius:0 10px 10px 0 !important;
}
.image-with-text .image-with-text__grid--reverse .image-with-text__text-item .image-with-text__content--desktop-left{
border-radius:10px 0 0 10px !important;
}
.image-with-text__grid .image-with-text__media-item--top  .image-with-text__media{
border-radius:10px 0 0 10px;
}
.image-with-text__grid .image-with-text__text-item .image-with-text__content{
border-radius:0 10px 10px 0;
}
main {
  scroll-snap-type: y mandatory;
}

.section {
  scroll-snap-align: center;
}
.image-with-text__grid{
width:90%;
height:90%;
transition: transform 0.5s;
margin:auto;
}
</style>
<script>
let allSections = document.querySelectorAll('.image-with-text__grid');
document.addEventListener("scroll", (event) => {
  lastKnownScrollPosition = window.scrollY;
console.log(lastKnownScrollPosition);
if(screen.width < 750 && 200 < lastKnownScrollPosition ){
allSections[0].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[1].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
}
if(screen.width < 750 && 1600 < lastKnownScrollPosition){
allSections[0].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
allSections[1].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[2].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
}
if(screen.width < 750 && 2500 < lastKnownScrollPosition){
allSections[1].style.transform='scale(1,1)'
allSections[2].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[3].style.transform='scale(1,1)'
}
if(screen.width < 750 && 3000 < lastKnownScrollPosition){
allSections[2].style.transform='scale(1,1)';
allSections[3].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
}
if(screen.width > 750 && lastKnownScrollPosition > 20){
allSections[0].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[1].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
}
if(screen.width > 750 && lastKnownScrollPosition > 1200){
allSections[0].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
allSections[1].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[2].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
}
if(screen.width > 750 && lastKnownScrollPosition > 1600){
allSections[0].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
allSections[1].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
allSections[2].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
allSections[3].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
}
if(screen.width > 750 && lastKnownScrollPosition > 2300){
allSections[2].style.transform="scale(1,1)";
allSections[3].style.transform="scale(1.1,1.1)";
}

});

</script>
